statements: SELECT * FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_location FROM IncidentReports WHERE investigation_status = 'Ongoing';
SELECT incident_location, incident_description FROM IncidentReports WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE incident_location LIKE '%North%' ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT incident_description FROM IncidentReports WHERE investigation_status = 'Resolved'
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE investigation_status = 'Pending';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_location FROM IncidentReports WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM IncidentReports WHERE incident_location LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY incident_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE incident_description IS NOT NULL AND investigation_status = 'Ongoing';
SELECT incident_date, incident_location, incident_description FROM IncidentReports WHERE incident_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_date, incident_location DESC;
SELECT id, report_date, reporter_name, incident_description, security_level FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE security_level = 'High';
SELECT reporter_name, report_date FROM IncidentReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT id, reporter_name, incident_description FROM IncidentReports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM InvestigationFindings WHERE investigator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE security_level = 'High';
SELECT id, reporter_name, report_date FROM IncidentReports WHERE security_level = 'Medium';
SELECT reporter_name, incident_description FROM IncidentReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE security_level = 'Low' AND report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT reporter_name, incident_description FROM IncidentReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT id, incident_date, location FROM IncidentReports ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT description FROM IncidentReports WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT reporter, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM IncidentReports GROUP BY reporter;
SELECT * FROM InvestigationFindings WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY finding_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT id, location, description FROM IncidentReports WHERE location LIKE '%NY%' AND status = 'Open';
SELECT reporter, COUNT(id) AS total_reports FROM IncidentReports GROUP BY reporter HAVING total_reports > 2;
SELECT IFNULL(reporter, 'Anonymous') AS reporter_name, description FROM IncidentReports WHERE location = 'Headquarters' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT sf.id, sf.protocol_name, sf.details, sp.responsible_person FROM SecurityProtocols sf JOIN SecurityProtocols sp ON sf.id = sp.id WHERE sf.id = 2;
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, location FROM incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, description FROM incidents WHERE location = 'Headquarters';
SELECT * FROM investigation_findings ORDER BY finding_date DESC;
SELECT finding_id, investigator, findings FROM investigation_findings WHERE recommendation IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER By incident_date DESC, incident_type ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_id, description, location FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Security Breach' ORDER BY incident_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT i.incident_id, i.incident_date, f.finding_date, f.investigator, f.findings FROM incidents i JOIN investigation_findings f ON i.incident_id = f.incident_id WHERE f.finding_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT p.protocol_name, p.protocol_description, r.strategy_description FROM security_protocols p LEFT JOIN response_strategies r ON p.protocol_id = r.strategy_id WHERE p.implementation_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM incidents i INNER JOIN investigation_findings f ON i.incident_id = f.incident_id WHERE f.recommendation IS NOT NULL ORDER BY f.finding_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports;
SELECT report_date, reporter_name FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM investigation_findings WHERE investigator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT finding_description, finding_status FROM investigation_findings WHERE incident_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT location_name, address FROM incident_locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports;
SELECT reporter_name, incident_details FROM incident_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM investigation_findings WHERE finding_status = 'Open';
SELECT protocol_name, protocol_description FROM security_protocols WHERE protocol_name LIKE '%incident%';
SELECT reporter_name, finding_description FROM incident_reports INNER JOIN investigation_findings ON incident_reports.incident_id = investigation_findings.incident_id;
